original_text: And he burned the house of the Lord, and the king's house and all the houses of Jerusalem; every great house he burned down.
korean_text: 여호와의 성전과 왕궁을 불사르고 예루살렘의 모든 집과 고관들의 집까지 불살랐으며

sentences.original_text: And he burned the house of the Lord
and all the houses of Jerusalem
every great house he burned down.
